Key Match Events: Aboubakar converted from the penalty split after Erick Ouma was adjudged to have handed the ball inside the box.
Hongla struck a shot from the edge of the box, with keeper Patrick Matasi fumbling his handling to see the ball bounce into the net.
Eric Ouma’s freekick from the left landed on skipper Olunga’s run at the backpost, the latter directing the ball home.
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Firat will now have three days to re-organize his charges before the return tie in Kampala on Monday.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Captain Vincent Aboubakar’s early penalty opened the floodgates for the Indomitable Lions.
Martin Hongla, Bryan Mbeumo and Christian Bassogog added more goals.
Kenya’s consolation was scored by skipper Michael Olunga.
